title: The facade operator schema
description: The JSON schema for facade operator.

DEPLOYMENT_STRATEGY_TYPE.title: DEPLOYMENT_STRATEGY_TYPE schema
DEPLOYMENT_STRATEGY_TYPE.description: Specify Deployment Strategy type for deploying service

DEPLOYMENT_SESSION_ID.description: Unique identifier of deployment session used to track e2e deploy activity
DEPLOYMENT_SESSION_ID.title: The DEPLOYMENT_SESSION_ID schema

NAMESPACE.title: The NAMESPACE schema
NAMESPACE.description: The namespace it is going to be deployed.

PAAS_VERSION.title: The PAAS_VERSION schema
PAAS_VERSION.description: This parameter specify paas where this service is deployed.

FACADE_GATEWAY_MEMORY_LIMIT.title: The FACADE_GATEWAY_MEMORY_LIMIT schema
FACADE_GATEWAY_MEMORY_LIMIT.description: Default memory limit for facade and composite gateways. It is not recommended to configure facade gateways HW resources via deploy parameters, deployment-configuration.yaml or CustomResource should be used instead. Minimal memory limit for egress-gateway is 64Mi.

FACADE_GATEWAY_CPU_LIMIT.title: The FACADE_GATEWAY_CPU_LIMIT schema
FACADE_GATEWAY_CPU_LIMIT.description: Default cpu limit for facade and composite gateways. It is not recommended to configure facade gateways HW resources via deploy parameters, deployment-configuration.yaml or CustomResource should be used instead.

FACADE_GATEWAY_CPU_REQUEST.title: The FACADE_GATEWAY_CPU_REQUEST schema
FACADE_GATEWAY_CPU_REQUEST.description: Default cpu request for facade and composite gateways. It is not recommended to configure facade gateways HW resources via deploy parameters, deployment-configuration.yaml or CustomResource should be used instead.

ARTIFACT_DESCRIPTOR_VERSION.title: The ARTIFACT_DESCRIPTOR_VERSION schema
ARTIFACT_DESCRIPTOR_VERSION.description: Artifact descriptor version which is installed.

IP_STACK.title: The IP_STACK schema
IP_STACK.description: Version of IP protocol used in cloud. Only values 'v6' or 'v4' are allowed.

FACADE_GATEWAY_REPLICAS.description: Number of replicas for facade and composite gateways.
FACADE_GATEWAY_REPLICAS.title: The FACADE_GATEWAY_REPLICAS schema

MAX_CONCURRENT_RECONCILES.description: MAX_CONCURRENT_RECONCILES is the maximum number of concurrent Reconciles which can be run
MAX_CONCURRENT_RECONCILES.title: The MAX_CONCURRENT_RECONCILES schema

XDS_CLUSTER_HOST.title: The XDS_CLUSTER_HOST schema
XDS_CLUSTER_HOST.description: Additional ingress's annotations for facade GWs.

XDS_CLUSTER_PORT.description: Additional ingress's annotations for facade GWs.
XDS_CLUSTER_PORT.title: The XDS_CLUSTER_PORT schema

READONLY_CONTAINER_FILE_SYSTEM_ENABLED.description: Read-only container file system is enabled
READONLY_CONTAINER_FILE_SYSTEM_ENABLED.title: The READONLY_CONTAINER_FILE_SYSTEM_ENABLED schema

FACADE_GATEWAY_TERMINATION_GRACE_PERIOD_.description: Amount of grace time prior to the container being forcibly terminated when marked for deletion or restarted. Unit in seconds. Values is propagating to facade and composite gateways.
FACADE_GATEWAY_TERMINATION_GRACE_PERIOD_.title: The FACADE_GATEWAY_TERMINATION_GRACE_PERIOD_S schema

GW_INGRESS_ANNOTATIONS.title: The GW_INGRESS_ANNOTATIONS schema
GW_INGRESS_ANNOTATIONS.description: Annotations for public and private gateways ingresses/routes.

TRACING_SAMPLER_RATELIMITING.description: The rate for requests sampling (number of traces per second)
TRACING_SAMPLER_RATELIMITING.title: The TRACING_SAMPLER_RATELIMITING schema

INGRESS_CLASS.title: The INGRESS_CLASS schema
INGRESS_CLASS.description: Variable can be used to set custom ingressClassName for ingresses.

CLOUD_TOPOLOGIES.title: Topologies settings for topologySpreadConstraints
CLOUD_TOPOLOGIES.description: Array of topologies settings for topologySpreadConstraints. Each array item must contain at least 'topologyKey' attribute. Other supported attributes are 'maxSkew' and 'whenUnsatisfiable' - optional.

HPA_ENABLED.description: Defines whether horizontal autoscaling enabled for microservice
HPA_ENABLED.title: The HPA_ENABLED scheme

HPA_MIN_REPLICAS.description: Defines the lower limit for the number of replicas to which the autoscaler can scale down
HPA_MIN_REPLICAS.title: The HPA_MIN_REPLICAS scheme

HPA_MAX_REPLICAS.description: Defines the upper limit for the number of replicas to which the autoscaler can scale up. It cannot be less that HPA_MIN_REPLICAS.
HPA_MAX_REPLICAS.title: The HPA_MAX_REPLICAS scheme

HPA_AVG_CPU_UTILIZATION_TARGET_PERCENT.description: Target average CPU utilization for horizontal pod autoscaling
HPA_AVG_CPU_UTILIZATION_TARGET_PERCENT.title: The HPA_AVG_CPU_UTILIZATION_TARGET_PERCENT scheme

HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PERCENT_PERIOD_SECONDS.description: Defines behavior.scaleDown.policies[].periodSeconds property in HPA resource for Percent type
HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PERCENT_PERIOD_SECONDS.title: The HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PERCENT_PERIOD_SECONDS scheme

HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PERCENT_VALUE.description: Defines behavior.scaleDown.policies[].value property in HPA resource for Percent type
HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PERCENT_VALUE.title: The HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PERCENT_VALUE scheme

HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PODS_PERIOD_SECONDS.description: Defines behavior.scaleDown.policies[].periodSeconds property in HPA resource for Pods type
HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PODS_PERIOD_SECONDS.title: The HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PODS_PERIOD_SECONDS scheme

HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PODS_VALUE.description: Defines behavior.scaleDown.policies[].value property in HPA resource for Pods type
HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PODS_VALUE.title: The HPA_SCALING_DOWN_PODS_VALUE scheme

HPA_SCALING_DOWN_SELECT_POLICY.description: Defines behavior.scaleDown.selectPolicy property in HPA resource. Allowed values are: Min, Max, Disabled
HPA_SCALING_DOWN_SELECT_POLICY.title: The HPA_SCALING_DOWN_SELECT_POLICY scheme

HPA_SCALING_UP_PERCENT_PERIOD_SECONDS.description: Defines behavior.scaleUp.policies[].periodSeconds property in HPA resource for Percent type
HPA_SCALING_UP_PERCENT_PERIOD_SECONDS.title: The HPA_SCALING_UP_PERCENT_PERIOD_SECONDS scheme

HPA_SCALING_UP_PERCENT_VALUE.description: Defines behavior.scaleUp.policies[].value property in HPA resource for Percent type
HPA_SCALING_UP_PERCENT_VALUE.title: The HPA_SCALING_UP_PERCENT_VALUE scheme

HPA_SCALING_UP_PODS_PERIOD_SECONDS.description: Defines behavior.scaleUp.policies[].periodSeconds property in HPA resource for Pods type
HPA_SCALING_UP_PODS_PERIOD_SECONDS.title: The HPA_SCALING_UP_PODS_PERIOD_SECONDS scheme

HPA_SCALING_UP_PODS_VALUE.description: Defines behavior.scaleUp.policies[].value property in HPA resource for Pods type
HPA_SCALING_UP_PODS_VALUE.title: The HPA_SCALING_UP_PODS_VALUE scheme

HPA_SCALING_UP_SELECT_POLICY.description: Defines behavior.scaleUp.selectPolicy property in HPA resource. Allowed values are: Min, Max, Disabled
HPA_SCALING_UP_SELECT_POLICY.title: The HPA_SCALING_UP_SELECT_POLICY scheme
